Summary: horizontal unwavering light streaks straight across sky at high speed
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was what looked like a shooting star, moving very fast, but it seemed low to the earth, just a bright white movement, very fast, smallish, but brighter than what I remember a shooting star, it did not look that distant. the light intensity was consistent, a bit brighter than a star but not a fireball or orb the entire time I saw it. It was also moving horizontal in a straight line, not pointing at any angle toward or away from the earth. light intensity abruptly stopped to nothing after shooting across sky
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in State College
There were no other sightings in State College on or around April 23rd 2013
